ack.p: This work was supported by the Disaster Relief Appropriations Act of 2013 (P.L. 113-2), which funded NOAA research grant NA14OAR4830100, the USGS South Central Climate Science Center at the University of Oklahoma through Grant #G13AC00386, the “Thousand Young Talents” Program in China, and grants (NNX15AB59G and NNX11AD46G) from the NASA Earth Science program.
